page.title: 17TOURISM IN BRAMSHAW AREA.
page.content: {WALKING AND RIDING.}This area of the Forest lends itself to the pursuits of walking & riding. {HOTELS AND PUBS.}Two hotels offer accomodation as well as food & drink. One pub offers food & drink. Several private houses cater for tourists. {CAMPING.}One camping site at Pipers Wait administered by the FC.Caravans, motor homes & tents may all use this site. {CAR PARKS AND PICNIC SITES.} Also administered by FC. As much of the Forest is inaccessible to cars people may leave their cars & walk. There are 5 car parks, two of which offer picnic facilities.
